Content.Title: Plot a single 2D Vector
Plot options for a single 2D Vector
Content.Text: 'r' Color = Red 'o' Color = Orange 'y' Color = Yellow 'g' Color = Green 'b' Color = Blue 'k' Color = Black '-' Style = Dashes '.' Style = Dots; 'c' showComponents = true;

Content.Title: quiver - field of 2D Vector
Content.Text: quiver (tails, vects); where tails and vects both 2xN matrices
